alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:23AM CDT until July 17 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL POTTAWATTAMIE...EASTERN HARRISON AND SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 522 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodbine, or 20 miles northwest of Harlan, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Panama around 535 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Persia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
